renegades.name: Renegades™
renegades.productInfoText: A cutting-edge design that delivers maximum performance. Featuring market-leading 8KO® lenses and ultra-durable frames for the active everyday.

attributes.content: A cutting-edge design that delivers maximum performance. Featuring market-leading 8KO® lenses and ultra-durable frames for the active everyday.
A cutting-edge design that delivers maximum performance. Featuring market-leading 8KO® lenses and ultra-durable frames for the active everyday.

attributes.name: twitter:description
attributes.content: A cutting-edge design that delivers maximum performance. Featuring market-leading 8KO® lenses and ultra-durable frames for the active everyday.

renegades.sizeAndFit:
**Gender:** Unisex
**Head Size:** Medium-Large
**Face Shape:** Universal
**Measurements:** 55mm (lens width) x 18mm (bridge) x 138mm (arm length)
**Best for:** Everyday, Sports

inTheBoxItems.title: 100% Microfibre Pouch
inTheBoxItems.description: For storage and cleaning, made from recycled plastic bottles.

inTheBoxItems.title: SunGod Sticker Pack
inTheBoxItems.description: Vinyl cut stickers, packaged in recyclable paper.

quotes.quote: It’s the vivid reflective lenses which really steal the show... And the matte frames have a long-standing, potentially scratch-proof durability to them.
Classic in shape, lightweight and secure fitting, they are just as good for sports as for everyday use.
They seem almost indestructible, consisting of bendable plastic frames and ultra-clear, ultra-tough lenses.

heroFeatures.label: Lenses
heroFeatures.title: See Better.
heroFeatures.description: Experience 8KO®, our best lenses yet. See with greater clarity than ever before through the most advanced lens technology on the planet. Built from 2mm nylon and available in 10 refined lens tints across our Lifestyle™ series, see better with 8KO®.

heroFeatures.label: Materials
heroFeatures.title: Built to Last.
heroFeatures.description: Our trademark ultra-flexible frame material provides un-rivalled durability and protection, flexing without snapping and staying light on your face for all-day comfort. Featuring Pop-Lock™ screwless hinges for maximum security and durability, {productName} are a pair of sunglasses that won't let you down. Accented with a premium brushed metal icon to finish.

heroFeatures.label: Guarantee
heroFeatures.title: SunGods are for Life.
heroFeatures.description: Keeping your gear in play is better than throwing it away. We believe so strongly in the durability of our products, that we cover them with our un-rivalled Lifetime Guarantee. If they break, we'll repair them (for free), extending the life of your {productName} and reducing our collective impact on the planet.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: SunGod x McLaren F1 Team.
baseProduct.productInfoText: The McLaren Formula 1 Team Renegades™ unite SunGod’s bestselling frames and industry-leading 8KO® Polarised lenses with the McLaren speedmark, lens engraving, and Papaya icons.

optionTech.displaySubtitle: Nylon. Lighter, clearer, and tougher, plus anti-glare polarisation.

staticLensTech.displaySubtitle: Nylon. Lighter, clearer, and tougher, plus anti-glare polarisation.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: SunGod x McLaren Miami 23 Edition
baseProduct.productInfoText: Famed for its sandy beaches, art deco vibe, vibrant multiculturalism and rich sporting heritage, what better place to inspire our latest Limited Edition? Our 8KO® Silver Blue lenses feature to, quite literally, reflect the crystal blue waters of the sunshine state. This design is finished with the iconic Miami palm tree as an engraving on the lens.

staticLensTech.displaySubtitle: Nylon. Lighter, clearer, and tougher than Standard.

baseProduct.name: Renegades™
baseProduct.subTitle: Woodsy Signature Series
baseProduct.productInfoText: The Woodsy Renegades™ feature a Limited Edition wood-patterned frame with 4KO® Polarised Smoke lenses and a Woodsy signature lens engraving. Your ultimate adventure companion, inspired by a champion.

children.value: How do I order Prescription by SunGod?
Find your perfect lens with our Lens Guide

articles.title: What is the difference between Standard and 8KO® lenses?
articles.bodyCopy:
Standard is our original lens technology, engineered and precisely manufactured from 2mm polycarbonate with triple-layer scratch resistance, 100% UV and impact protection and perfect optics, no matter how extreme the conditions. Standard lenses are available across our Lifestyle Series™ and our Snow Series™.

8KO® stands for 8K Optics. 8KO® is the most advanced lens technology on the planet, with lenses manufactured from 2mm co-nylon, which is optically superior and lighter than industry-standard polycarbonate. 8KO® lenses offer the same triple-layer scratch resistance as our Standard Lenses with 100% UV and impact protection but with superior optical clarity and a lighter weight, offering unrivalled performance and a new advantage in every situation. 8KO® lenses are now available across both our Pace Series™ and our Lifestyle Series™.

renegades.registerInterestFormCopy: Enter your email below and we will alert you if this product comes back in stock.

children.value: We've built our reputation on high performance products with unrivalled durability. That's why your SunGod Renegades™ frames are covered by the SunGod Lifetime Guarantee. If they break (or you break them) we will repair your Renegades™ free of charge.
Because keeping gear in play is better than throwing it away.
Sunglasses without prescription, featuring triple-layer scratch resistance and 100% UV-A and UV-B protection.
Sunglasses with single-vision corrective lenses, for long or short-sighted prescription wearers.
We’ll ask for your prescription after checkout.
